database.description: Prisma schema, client, and database utilities

web.description: Next.js web application for FGC betting platform

rules: Never create files outside existing packages without explicit instruction
Do not duplicate shared types across apps - use @repo/database exports
Prefer shared packages over app-local utilities
Assume strict TypeScript and ESLint are enabled
Always use Prisma types from @repo/database, never redefine them
Use @repo/ui for shared components, not app-local duplicates
Database operations should always go through Prisma client from @repo/database
For fictional currency, use 'chips' terminology consistently
All betting odds use American format (e.g., -150, +200)
